{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11841v1", "title": "Permutation dimensions of prime cyclic groups", "summary": "Based on recent successes concerning permutation resolutions of
representations by Balmer and Gallauer we define a new invariant of finite
groups: the p-permutation dimension. We compute this invariant for cyclic
groups of prime order.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-04-16T08:00:36Z"}
